


def useful_method_on_pandas_df(self, func, *args, **kwargs):
    blalba(self, *args)
    return func(self)

#src.__init__.py
def save(self, writer):
    return writer(self)

pandas.DataFrame.save = save

import src
import src.packagexy.asöaökja.asdlfkjöi

df = pd.read_pickle('file.pkl')
df = df.loc[]
df.save(writer)
